ojc.ahni.experiments

Class TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.ahni.integration.BulkFitnessFunctionMT
      • ojc.ahni.integration.TargetFitnessFunctionMT
        • ojc.ahni.experiments.TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, java.io.Serializable, AHNIEventListener, BulkFitnessFunction

    public class TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT
extends TargetFitnessFunctionMT
    A test fitness function that determines fitness based on how close the output of a network is to a target output given some input. The specific test set can be specified with the property key "fitness.function.test.type". Valid values are:
    • pass-through: the output should match the input, new random input patterns are generated for every generation.
    • parity: bitwise parity over all inputs.
    • [More to come!]
    The number of trials is determined by the number of inputs as 2 ^ (inputCount), thus every possible input pattern is tested. See TargetFitnessFunctionMT for other available parameters that may be specified via the properties file.
    Author:
    Oliver Coleman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
